typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['S4D/VBAK','S4D/VBAK/processed']) ~> VBAKDL
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['/S4D/VBAP','S4D/VBAP/processed']) ~> VBAPDL
VBAKDL, VBAPDL join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SalesData
SalesData sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
